title: Storage as a Service Market in the US Expected to Post a CAGR of Over 33% From 2015-2019: Technavio
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/16/2015 @ 8:45 AM Companies mentioned in this article: TechNavio Research 
LONDON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Technavio has published a new report on the storage as a service (STaaS) market in the US ,which is expected to grow at a CAGR of over 33% from 2015-2019. 
About the Report 
According to the latest report by Technavio, cloud computing has enhanced the ease of data storage and analytics processing, as analyzing enormous data sets requires significant computing capacity. 
“It is easier to use analytical tools on data that is stored in a cloud because the platform supports quicker retrieval of data through multiple applications and ensures minimal latency,” says Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of Technavio. 
The latest report by Technavio also highlights the increased use of cloud storage gateway, a cost-effective hybrid appliance that combines local storage and cloud-based storage with data protection functionalities to form a collaborative package. 
“Cloud storage gateways are necessary to ensure that the data stored on cloud-based storage infrastructure is optimized according to established standards and it also helps in managing network traffic,” adds Ghaus. 
Market Scope and Calculation of Market Size 
The new Technavio report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the storage as a service market in the US from 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, this report considers revenue generated by stand-alone storage services, cloud-based backup and archiving services, and the subscription cost paid by enterprises for storage services.
